vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and a resolution accepting an amendment to a portion of deed restrictions [Z045-239] on property zoned an R-10(A) Single Family District with deed restrictions [Z045-239], on the northeast line of Middlefield Road, southeast of Bicentennial Lane
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval 
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval 
Z234-268(MB)
